definitions.title: loc.
definitions.body: a N. district of Edom, poet. often = Edom Am 1:12 (‖[[אֱדוֹם]] v:Am 1:11, and [[בָּחְרָה]]), Ob:Ob 9 (‖[[הַר־עֵשָׂו]]), Je 49:7, Je 49:20, Ez Eze 25:13 (all ‖[[אֱדוֹם]]); Hb Hab 3:3 (‖[[הַר־פָּארָן]]); prob. also Jos 12:3, Jos 13:4 (both D); in Ge 3:6 (P) as name of an Edomite chief, son of [[אֱלִיפַז]] and grandson of Esau v:Ge 3:11 = 1Ch 1:36; v:1Ch 1:42 = 1Ch 1:53; so [[תֵּו֠מָן]] Ge 36:15.—Vid. further Buhl:Edomiter 30.
